LanguageData.XFMParmor_MechanicalArmorCore_Carrier.co: >Attacks hostiles with ranged attack. >If three drones are standby, use offensive order to assist in attacks. >If at least two drones are standby, when an ally is harmed by melee damage, dispatch drones to assist in melee attack with offensive order. >If at least two drones are standby, when an ally is harmed by ranged damage, dispatch drones to defend the ally with defensive order. >If harmed by melee damage, dispatch drones to assist in melee attack with offensive order. >If harmed by ranged damage, dispatch drones to defend self with defensive order.
Dispatches drone to protect the target. The drone shields the target from hostile fire while allowing the protected target to fire uninterrupted.
Dispatches drone to attack the target. The drone's rotor blades can cut into enemy in close combat, disrupting them in the process.

LanguageData.XFMParmor_Weapon_Carrier.description: Charged LMG linked to drones with fire coordinator chips, when the LMG fires, the drone's charge blaster fires too.
